detail_desc: Boxy-style top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly with buttons, patch front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
A pair of metal earrings in the shape of a rainbow decorated with glass rhinestones.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist, lined front and slightly longer legs.
Cropped corset top in crisp nylon with a square neckline. Wide shoulder straps, support panels at the front, a smocked back and an asymmetric hem. Lined at the front.
Bikini top with a decorative frill trim at the hem and underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Cap in cotton twill with embroidery on the front and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.

Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, puffy flounces in a double layer of tulle over the shoulders, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons at the back of the neck and a longer layer in woven fabric at the hem.

Short dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a front pocket and adjustable, crossover straps. Side pockets, back pockets, buttons at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Metal earrings in various designs. Three pairs of hoops and one pair with hanging hoops. Diameter 1.5 cm-3 cm.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Spacious fabric backpack with a handle at the top and padded, adjustable shoulder straps. Drawstring closure and a flap with adjustable tabs and plastic fasteners. Two side compartments with a flap and concealed press-stud, a zipped inner compartment and a padded back plate. Lined. Size 34x44 cm.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Treggings in soft stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, and a decorative appliqué on the knees.
Coat in a fine-knit wool blend with a small collar and detachable tie belt at the waist. Side pockets, a single back vent and no buttons. Unlined.
Metal earrings with a clip at the top and post at the bottom. Length approx. 4.5 cm.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with medium coverage at the back.
Dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and adjustable straps with press-studs at the front. Soft brushed inside.
Boxy jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fitted corset top in stretch twill with a heart-shaped neckline and decorative, sewn-in lacing at the front. Silicone trim at the top to hold the top in place and a visible zip at the back.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a square neckline and smocked bodice. Long puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Soft shoulder bag in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with a zip at the top and adjustable shoulder strap. Lined. Size 29x35 cm unfolded.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Sleeveless playsuit in printed cotton jersey with a narrow, elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and small frill trim at the hems.

V-neck nursing blouse in woven fabric with a unique nursing feature, small flutter sleeves and a box pleat at the front for added width. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. The blouse is lined with recycled polyester.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy patterned weave with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in the side and a laser-cut hem. Unlined.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in sturdy, glossy jersey with a square neckline that has a V-shaped incision at the front with support panels to help retain its shape. Cut-out section at the back, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and flared legs. Lined at the top.
Suit shorts in woven fabric with a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with frills down the front, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Low sandals in imitation leather with a wide foot strap and adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal fastener. Leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
Hi-tops with a hook and loop tab at the top and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh insoles and fluted soles.
Sandals with adjustable foot straps and a loop at the back. Moulded thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles, fluted underneath.
Open jacket in airy, dobby-weave viscose with dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a pompom trim at the cuffs and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned fleece that fasten down the front and along one leg. Ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Tube scarf in a soft knit with a small appliqué at the hem.
Pre-tied bow tie with a matching handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim. V-neck front and back, a sewn-in wrapover at the front, diagonal side pockets and an elasticated seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Small bag in regenerated leather with a narrow metal chain shoulder strap, a decorative metal ring on the flap and two inner compartments. Lined. Size 4x13x21 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length, off-the-shoulder lace dress with a seam at the waist, concealed zip at the back and gently flared skirt. Lined
Boots in imitation leather with an imitation suede shaft and drawstring at the top. Soft pile linings. Heel 5 cm.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
High-waisted jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Sleeveless, cropped top in ribbed jersey. Narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front.
Long skirt in soft, heavily draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Double-layered hat in ribbed cotton jersey with a small appliqué on the front.
Ankle-length dress in a crinkled weave with a flounced trim at the top. Narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a ribbed section at the front and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini top with frills, a wrapover front with ties, side support and adjustable shoulder straps.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with embroidery at the top and on one sleeve and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.
Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a cotton blend with an open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with buttons and broderie anglaise frills at the top, short, butterfly sleeves and a gathered yoke at the front.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fingerless gloves in a soft, fine knit with double-layered ribbing and elastication and a contrasting colour section at the top.
Lightweight boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened together with a hook-and-eye at the back. Wide ribbed hem with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Extra firm support.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, patch front pockets and a back pocket.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.

Cropped, fitted blouse in satin with an open back, sweetheart neckline and short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Narrow crossover straps at the back and a horizontal tie at the hem. Jersey-lined front.
Glasses with plastic frames and clear lenses with no magnification.
Pencil skirt in imitation leather with a slit at the front, concealed zip at the back and raw-edge hem. Unlined.
Sandals in imitation leather with crossover straps at the front, moulded imitation suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Fitted jumper in an airy rib knit with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
